[03] 516^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P0.0215^ea^ so peto sa.mviggamaanaso  sa.mvegaanuruupa.m aayati.m attanaa kaatabba.m dassento ^b^``soha.m nuunaa''^eb^ti  gaathamaaha. ta.m uttaanatthameva.
[03] eva.m petena vutto mahaakassapo ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa  sampattaparisaaya dhamma.m desesi.

[03] ^b^vesaalii^eb^ ^a^M0.0200^ea^ ^a^V0.0188^ea^ ^b^naama nagaratthi vajjiina^eb^nti ida.m ambasakkarapetavatthu.  tassa kaa uppatti? bhagavati jetavane viharante ambasakkaro naama  licchaviraajaa micchaadi.t.thiko natthikavaado vesaaliya.m rajja.m kaaresi.  tena ca samayena vesaalinagare a~n~natarassa vaa.nijassa aapa.nasamiipe  cikkhalla.m hoti, tattha bahuu janaa uppatitvaa atikkamantaa kilamanti,  keci kaddamena limpanti. ta.m disvaa so vaa.nijo ``maa ime  manussaa kalala.m akkami.msuu''ti apagataduggandha.m sa"nkhava.n.napa.tibhaaga.m  gosiisa.t.thi.m aaharaapetvaa nikkhipaapesi. pakatiyaa ca siilavaa ahosi  akkodhano sa.nhavaaco, paresa~nca yathaabhuuta.m gu.na.m kitteti.

[03] so ekasmi.m divase attano sahaayassa nhaayantassa pamaadena  anolokentassa nivaasanavattha.m kii.laadhippaayena apanidhaaya ta.m  dukkhaapetvaa adaasi. bhaagineyyo panassa corikaaya paragehato bha.n.da.m  aaharitvaa tasseva aapa.ne nikkhipi. bha.n.dasaamikaa viima.msantaa  bha.n.dena saddhi.m tassa bhaagineyya.m ta~nca ra~n~no dassesu.m. raajaa  ``imassa siisa.m chindatha, bhaagineyya.m panassa suule aaropethaa''ti  aa.naapesi. raajapurisaa tathaa aka.msu. so kaala.m katvaa bhummadevesu  uppajji. so gosiisena setuno katattaa setava.n.na.m ^a^P0.0216^ea^  dibba.m manojava.m assaajaaniiya.m pa.tilabhi, gu.navantaana.m va.n.nakathanena  tassa gattato dibbagandho vaayati, saa.takassa pana apanihitattaa naggo  ahosi. so attanaa pubbe katakamma.m olokento tadanusaarena attano  bhaagineyya.m suule aaropita.m disvaa karu.naaya codiyamaano manojava.m  assa.m abhiruhitvaa a.d.dharattisamaye tassa suulaa ropita.t.thaana.m gantvaa  aviduure .thito ``jiiva, bho, jiivitameva seyyo''ti divase divase  vadati.

[03] tena ca samayena ambasakkaro raajaa hatthikkhandhavaragato nagara.m  padakkhi.na.m karonto a~n~natarasmi.m gehe vaatapaana.m vivaritvaa raajavibhuuti.m  passanti.m ^a^M0.0201^ea^ eka.m itthi.m disvaa pa.tibaddhacitto hutvaa pacchaasane  nisinnassa purisassa ``ima.m ghara.m ima~nca itthi.m upadhaarehii''ti sa~n~na.m  datvaa anukkamena ^a^V0.0189^ea^ attano raajageha.m pavi.t.tho ta.m purisa.m pesesi --  ``gaccha, bha.ne, tassaa itthiyaa sasaamikabhaava.m vaa asaamikabhaava.m vaa  jaanaahii''ti. so gantvaa tassaa sasaamikabhaava.m ~natvaa ra~n~no  aarocesi. raajaa tassaa itthiyaa pariggaha.nuupaaya.m cintento tassaa  saamika.m pakkosaapetvaa ``ehi, bha.ne, ma.m upa.t.thaahii''ti aaha. so  anicchantopi ``raajaa attano vacana.m akaronte mayi raajada.n.da.m  kareyyaa''ti bhayena raajupa.t.thaana.m sampa.ticchitvaa divase divase raajupa.t.thaana.m  gacchati. raajaapi tassa bhattavetana.m daapetvaa katipayadivasaatikkamena  paatova upa.t.thaana.m aagata.m evamaaha -- ``gaccha, bha.ne, amumhi .thaane ekaa  pokkhara.nii atthi, tato aru.nava.n.namattika.m rattuppalaani ca aanehi,  sace ajjeva naagaccheyyaasi, jiivita.m te natthii''ti. tasmi~nca gate  dvaarapaala.m aaha -- ``ajja anattha"ngate eva suuriye sabbadvaaraani  thaketabbaanii''ti.

[03] saa ca pokkhara.nii vesaaliyaa tiyojanamatthake hoti, tathaapi  so puriso mara.nabhayatajjito vaatavegena pubba.nheyeva ta.m pokkhara.ni.m  sampaapu.ni. ``saa ca pokkhara.nii amanussapariggahitaa''ti pageva  sutattaa bhayena so ``atthi nu kho ettha koci parissayo''ti  samantato ^a^P0.0217^ea^ anupariyaayati. ta.m disvaa  pokkhara.nipaalako amanusso karu.naayamaanaruupo manussaruupena  upasa"nkamitvaa ``kimattha.m, bho purisa, idhaagatosii''ti aaha. so  tassa ta.m pavatti.m kathesi. so ``yadi eva.m yaavadattha.m ga.nhaahii''ti  attano dibbaruupa.m dassetvaa antaradhaayi.

[01] so tattha aru.nava.n.namattika.m rattuppalaani ca gahetvaa  anattha"ngateyeva suuriye nagaradvaara.m sampaapu.ni. ta.m disvaa dvaarapaalo  tassa viravantasseva dvaara.m thakesi. so thakite dvaare pavesana.m  alabhanto dvaarasamiipe suule aaropita.m purisa.m disvaa ``ete mayi  anattha"ngate eva suuriye aagate viravante eva.m dvaara.m thakesu.m. `aha.m  kaaleyeva aagato, mama daaso natthii'ti tayaapi ~naata.m hotuu''ti  ^a^M0.0202^ea^ sakkhimakaasi. ta.m sutvaa so aaha ``aha.m suule aavuto vajjho  mara.naabhimukho, katha.m tava sakkhi homi. eko panettha peto  mahiddhiko mama samiipa.m aagamissati, ta.m sakkhi.m karohii''ti.  ``katha.m pana so mayaa da.t.thabbo''ti? idheva tva.m ti.t.tha, ``sayameva  dakkhissasii''ti. so tattha .thito majjhimayaame ta.m peta.m aagata.m  disvaa sakkhi.m akaasi. vibhaataaya ca rattiyaa ra~n~naa ``mama aa.naa  tayaa atikkantaa, tasmaa raajada.n.da.m te karissaamii''ti vutte, deva, mayaa  tava aa.naa naatikkantaa, anattha"ngate eva suuriye aha.m idhaagatoti.  tattha ko te sakkhiiti? so ^a^V0.0190^ea^ tassa suulaavutassa purisassa santike  aagacchanta.m naggapeta.m ``sakkhii''ti niddisitvaa ``kathameta.m amhehi  saddhaatabba''nti ra~n~naa vutte ``ajja rattiya.m tumhehi saddhaatabba.m purisa.m  mayaa saddhi.m pesethaa''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa raajaa sayameva tena saddhi.m  tattha gantvaa .thito petena ca tatthaagantvaa ``jiiva, bho, jiivitameva  seyyo''ti vutte ta.m ^b^``seyyaa nisajjaa nayimassa  atthii''^eb^tiaadinaa pa~ncahi gaathaahi pa.tipucchi. idaani aadito  pana ^b^``vesaali naama nagaratthi vajjiina''^eb^nti gaathaa taasa.m  sambandhadassanattha.m sa"ngiitikaarehi .thapitaa --
[21] ``vesaalii ^a^P0.0218^ea^ naama nagaratthi vajjiina.m,  tattha ahu licchavi ambasakkaro.
[22] disvaana peta.m nagarassa baahira.m, tattheva pucchittha ta.m  kaara.natthiko..
[21] ``seyyaa nisajjaa nayimassa atthi, abhikkamo natthi  pa.tikkamo ca.
[21] ``ye ~naatakaa di.t.thasutaa suhajjaa, anukampakaa yassa  ahesu.m pubbe.
[22] da.t.thumpi te daani na ta.m labhanti, viraajitato hi  janena tena..
[21] ``na ^a^M0.0203^ea^ oggatattassa bhavanti mittaa, jahanti mittaa  vikala.m viditvaa.
[22] attha~nca disvaa parivaarayanti, bahuu mittaa uggatattassa  honti..
[26] atha tva.m kena va.n.nena vadesi yakkha,

[03] 517^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tassa.m vesaaliya.m.  ^b^nagarassa baahira^eb^nti nagarassa bahi bhava.m, vesaalinagarassa bahi  eva ^a^P0.0219^ea^ jaata.m pavatta.m sambandha.m. ^b^tatthevaa^eb^ti yattha ta.m  passi, tattheva .thaane. ^b^ta^eb^nti ^a^V0.0191^ea^ ta.m peta.m. ^b^kaara.natthiko^eb^ti  ``jiiva, bho, jiivitameva seyyo''ti vuttaatthassa kaara.nena atthiko  hutvaa.

[03] 518^b^.^eb^ ^b^seyyaa nisajjaa nayimassa atthii^eb^ti  pi.t.thipasaara.nalakkha.naa seyyaa, palla"nkaabhujanalakkha.naa nisajjaa ca  imassa suule aaropitapuggalassa natthi. ^b^abhikkamo natthi  pa.tikkamo caa^eb^ti abhikkamaadilakkha.na.m appamattakampi gamana.m imassa  natthi. ^b^paricaarikaa saapii^eb^ti yaa  asitapiitakhaayitavatthaparibhogaadilakkha.naa indriyaana.m paricaara.naa,  saapi imassa natthi. ``parihara.naa saapii''ti vaa paa.tho,  asitaadiparibhogavasena indriyaana.m parihara.naa, saapi imassa natthi  vigatajiivitattaati attho. ``paricaara.naa saapii''ti keci pa.thanti.

[03] 519^b^.^eb^ ^b^di.t.thasutaa suhajjaa, anukampakaa yassa ahesu.m  pubbe^eb^ti sandi.t.thasahaayaa ceva adi.t.thasahaayaa ca yassa mittaa  anuddayaavanto ye ^a^M0.0204^ea^ assa imassa pubbe ahesu.m. ^b^da.t.thumpii^eb^ti  passitumpi na labhanti, kuto saha vasitunti attho.  ^b^viraajitatto^eb^ti pariccattasabhaavo. ^b^janena tenaa^eb^ti tena  ~naatiaadijanena.

[03] 520^b^.^eb^ ^b^na oggatattassa bhavanti mittaa^eb^ti  apagatavi~n~naa.nassa matassa mittaa naama na honti tassa mittehi  kaatabbakiccassa atikkantattaa. ^b^jahanti mittaa vikala.m  viditvaa^eb^ti mato taava ti.t.thatu, jiivantampi bhogavikala.m purisa.m  viditvaa ``na ito ki~nci gayhuupaga''nti mittaa pajahanti.  ^b^attha~nca disvaa parivaarayantii^eb^ti tassa pana santaka.m attha.m dhana.m  disvaa piyavaadino mukhullokikaa hutvaa ta.m parivaarenti. ^b^bahuu  mittaa uggatattassa hontii^eb^ti vibhavasampattiyaa ^a^P0.0220^ea^  uggatasabhaavassa samiddhassa bahuu anekaa mittaa honti, aya.m  lokiyasabhaavoti attho.

[03] 521^b^.^eb^ ^b^nihiinatto sabbabhogehii^eb^ti sabbehi  upabhogaparibhogavatthuuhi parihiinatto. ^b^kiccho^eb^ti dukkhito.  ^b^sammakkhito^eb^ti ruhirehi sammakkhitasariiro.  ^b^samparibhinnagatto^eb^ti suulena abbhantare vidaalitagatto.  ^b^ussaavabinduuva palimpamaano^eb^ti ti.nagge  limpamaanaussaavabindusadiso. ^b^ajja suve^eb^ti ajja vaa suve vaa  imassa naama purisassa jiivitassa uparodho nirodho, tato uddha.m  nappavattatiiti attho.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ ^b^uttaasita^eb^nti aavuta.m aaropita.m.  ^b^pucimandassa suule^eb^ti nimbarukkhassa da.n.dena katasuule ^a^V0.0192^ea^. ^b^kena  va.n.nenaa^eb^ti kena kaara.nena. ^b^jiiva, bho, jiivitameva seyyo^eb^ti,  bho purisa, jiiva. kasmaa? suula.m aaropitassaapi hi te idha  jiivitameva ito cutassa jiivitato satabhaagena sahassabhaagena seyyo  sundarataroti.
[03] eva.m tena ra~n~naa pucchito so peto attano adhippaaya.m  pakaasento --
[21] ``saalohito esa ahosi mayha.m, aha.m saraami  purimaaya jaatiyaa.
[22] disvaa ca me kaaru~n~namahosi raaja, maa paapadhammo  niraya.m pataaya.m..
[21] ``ito ^a^M0.0205^ea^ cuto licchavi esa poso, satthussada.m niraya.m  ghoraruupa.m.
[21] ``anekabhaagena gu.nena seyyo, ayameva suulo nirayena  tena.
[22] ekantadukkha.m ka.tuka.m bhayaanaka.m, ekantatibba.m niraya.m  pataaya.m..
[21] ``ida~nca ^a^P0.0221^ea^ sutvaa vacana.m mameso,  dukkhuupaniito vijaheyya paa.na.m.
[22] tasmaa aha.m santike na bha.naami, maa mekato  jiivitassuuparodho''ti.. --

[03] 523^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^saalohito^eb^ samaanalohito  yonisambandhena sambandho, ~naatakoti attho. ^b^purimaaya  jaatiyaa^eb^ti purimattabhaave. ^b^maa paapadhammo niraya.m pataaya^eb^nti  aya.m paapadhammo puriso niraya.m maa pati, maa niraya.m upapajjiiti ima.m  disvaa me kaaru~n~na.m ahosiiti yojanaa.

[03] 524^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattussada^eb^nti paapakaariihi sattehi ussanna.m,  atha vaa pa~ncavidhabandhana.m, mukhe tattalohasecana.m, a"ngaarapabbataaropana.m,  lohakumbhipakkhepana.m, asipattavanappavesana.m, vettara.niya.m samotara.na.m,  mahaaniraye pakkhepoti. imehi sattahi pa~ncavidhabandhanaadiihi  daaru.nakaara.nehi ussanna.m, uparuupari nicitanti attho.  ^b^mahaabhitaapa^eb^nti mahaadukkha.m, mahaaaggisantaapa.m vaa.  ^b^ka.tuka^eb^nti ani.t.tha.m. ^b^bhayaanaka^eb^nti bhayajanaka.m.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ ^b^anekabhaagena^eb^ ^a^V0.0193^ea^ ^b^gu.nenaa^eb^ti anekako.t.thaasena  aanisa.msena. ^b^ayameva suulo nirayena tenaa^eb^ti tato imassa  uppatti.t.thaanabhuutato nirayato ayameva suulo seyyoti. nissakke hi  ^a^M0.0206^ea^ ida.m kara.navacana.m. ^b^ekanta tibba^eb^nti ekanteneva tikhi.nadukkha.m,  niyatamahaadukkhanti attho.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ ^b^ida~nca sutvaa vacana.m mameso^eb^ti ``ito  cuto''tiaadinaa vutta.m mama vacana.m sutvaa eso puriso dukkhuupaniito  mama vacanena nirayadukkha.m upaniito viya hutvaa. ^b^vijaheyya  paa.na^eb^nti attano jiivita.m pariccajeyya. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti tena  kaara.nena. ^b^maa mekato^eb^ti ``mayaa ekato imassa purisassa  jiivitassa uparodho maa hotuu''ti imassa santike ida.m vacana.m aha.m na  bha.naami, atha kho ^a^P0.0222^ea^ ``jiiva, bho, jiivitameva  seyyo''ti idameva bha.naamiiti adhippaayo.
[03] eva.m petena attano adhippaaye pakaasite puna raajaa petassa  pavatti.m pucchitu.m okaasa.m karonto ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``a~n~naato eso purisassa attho, a~n~nampi icchaamase  pucchitu.m tuva.m.
[22] okaasakamma.m sace no karosi, pucchaama ta.m no na ca  kujjhitabba''nti..
[21] ``addhaa pa.ti~n~naa me tadaa ahu, naacikkha.naa  appasannassa hoti.
[22] akaamaa saddheyyavacoti katvaa, pucchassu ma.m kaama.m yathaa  visayha''nti.. --
[03] 527^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^a~n~naato^eb^ti avagato.  ^b^icchaamase^eb^ti icchaama. ^b^no^eb^ti amhaaka.m. ^b^na ca  kujjhitabba^eb^nti ``ime manussaa ya.mki~nci pucchantii''ti kodho na  kaatabbo.

[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ^b^addhaa^eb^ti eka.msena. ^b^pa.ti~n~naa me^eb^ti  ~naa.navasena mayha.m ``pucchassuu''ti pa.ti~n~naa, okaasadaananti attho.  ^b^tadaa ahuu^eb^ti tasmi.m kaale ^a^M0.0207^ea^ pa.thamadassane ahosi.  ^b^naacikkha.naa appasannassa hotii^eb^ti akathanaa appasannassa hoti.  pasanno eva hi pasannassa ki~nci katheti. tva.m pana tadaa mayi  appasanno, aha~nca tayi, tena pa.tijaanitvaa kathetukaamo naahosi.  idaani panaaha.m tuyha.m ^b^akaamaa saddheyyavaco^eb^ akaamo eva  saddhaatabbavacano ^b^iti katvaa^eb^ iminaa kaara.nena ^a^V0.0194^ea^. ^b^pucchassu^eb^  ^a^P0.0223^ea^ ^b^ma.m kaama.m yathaa visayha^eb^nti tva.m yathaa icchasi,  tamattha.m ma.m pucchassu. aha.m pana yathaa visayha.m yathaa mayha.m sahitu.m  sakkaa, tathaa attano ~naa.nabalaanuruupa.m kathessaamiiti adhippaayo.
[03] eva.m petena pucchanaaya okaase kate raajaa --

[25] gaathamaaha. tassattho -- aha.m ya.m ki~ncideva cakkhunaa  passissaami, ta.m sabbampi tatheva aha.m abhisaddaheyya.m, ta.m pana disvaava  ta.m vacana.m nopi ce saddaheyya.m. yakkha, mayha.m niyassakamma.m  niggahakamma.m kareyyaasiiti. atha vaa ^b^ya.m ki~ncaha.m cakkhunaa  passissaamii^eb^ti aha.m ya.m ki~ncideva cakkhunaa passissaami  acakkhugocarassa adassanato. ^b^sabbampi taaha.m abhisaddaheyya^eb^nti  sabbampi te aha.m di.t.tha.m suta.m a~n~na.m vaa abhisaddaheyya.m. taadiso hi  mayha.m tayi abhippasaadoti adhippaayo. pacchimapadassa pana  yathaavuttova attho.
[21] ``saccappa.ti~n~naa tava mesaa hotu, sutvaana dhamma.m labha  suppasaada.m.
[27] a~n~natthiko no ca padu.t.thacitto, ya.m te suta.m  asuta~ncaapi dhamma.m.
[22] sabbampi akkhissa.m yathaa pajaana''nti.. -- gaathamaaha  ^a^M0.0208^ea^. ito para.m --
[22] yaana.m ida.m abbhuta.m dassaneyya.m, kisseta.m kammassa aya.m  vipaakoti..
[22] gosiisamekaaha.m pasannacitto, seta.m gahetvaa narakasmi.m  nikkhipi.m..
[21] ``etasmi.m ^a^V0.0195^ea^ paadaani pati.t.thapetvaa, maya~nca a~n~ne ca  atikkamimhaa.
[22] yaana.m ida.m abbhuta.m dassaneyya.m, tasseva kammassa aya.m  vipaakoti..
[21] ``va.n.no ca te sabbadisaa pabhaasati, gandho ca te  sabbadisaa pavaayati.
[22] yakkhiddhipattosi mahaanubhaavo, naggo caasi kissa  aya.m vipaakoti..
[22] tasseva kammassa aya.m vipaako, dibbo me va.n.no satata.m  pabhaasati..
[22] tasseva kammassa aya.m vipaako, dibbo me gandho satata.m  pavaayati..
[21] ``sahaayaana.m ^a^M0.0209^ea^ titthasmi.m nhaayantaana.m, thale gahetvaa  nidahissa dussa.m.
[22] khi.d.datthiko no ca padu.t.thacitto, tenamhi naggo kasiraa  ca vuttiiti..
[22] akii.lamaano pana yo karoti, ki.m tassa kammassa  vipaakamaahuuti..
[21] ``ye du.t.thasa"nkappamanaa manussaa, kaayena vaacaaya ca  sa.mkili.t.thaa.
[22] kaayassa bhedaa abhisamparaaya.m, asa.msaya.m te niraya.m upenti..
[22] kaayassa bhedaa abhisamparaaya.m, asa.msaya.m te sugati.m  upentii''ti.. --

[03] 530^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^saccappa.ti~n~naa tava mesaa hotuu^eb^ti  ``sabbampi taaha.m abhisaddaheyya''nti tava esaa pa.ti~n~naa mayha.m sacca.m  hotu. ^b^sutvaana dhamma.m labha suppasaada^eb^nti mayaa vuccamaana.m dhamma.m  sutvaa sundara.m pasaada.m labhassu. ^b^a~n~natthiko^eb^ti aajaananatthiko.  ^b^yathaa pajaana^eb^nti yathaa a~n~nopi ^a^V0.0196^ea^ pajaananto, ``yathaapi  ~naata''nti vaa mayaa yathaa ~naatanti attho.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ ^b^kisseta.m kammassa aya.m vipaako^eb^ti  kisseta.m kissa naama eta.m, kissa kammassa aya.m vipaako.  ^b^eta^eb^nti vaa nipaatamatta.m, kissa kammassaati yojanaa.  ``kissa te''ti ca keci pa.thanti.

[03] 532-33^b^.^eb^ ^b^cikkhallamagge^eb^ti ^a^M0.0210^ea^ cikkhallavati pathamhi.  ^b^naraka^eb^nti aavaa.ta.m. ^b^ekaaha^eb^nti eka.m aha.m. ^b^narakasmi.m  nikkhipi^eb^nti yathaa kaddamo na akkamiiyati, eva.m tasmi.m  cikkhallaavaa.te .thapesi.m. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti tassa gosiisena setukara.nassa.

[03] 536-7^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhamme .thitaana^eb^nti dhammacaariina.m samacaariina.m.  ^b^mantemii^eb^ti kathemi kittayaami. ^b^khi.d.datthiko^eb^ti  ^a^P0.0226^ea^ hasaadhippaayo. ^b^no ca padu.t.thacitto^eb^ti  dussasaamike na duusitacitto, na avahara.naadhippaayo naapi  vinaasaadhippaayoti attho.

[03] 538^b^.^eb^ ^b^akii.lamaano^eb^ti akhi.d.daadhippaayo,  lobhaadiihi duusitacitto. ^b^ki.m tassa kammassa vipaakamaahuu^eb^ti  tassa tathaa katassa paapakammassa kiiva ka.tuka.m dukkhavipaaka.m pa.n.ditaa  aahu.

[03] 539-40^b^.^eb^ ^b^du.t.thasa"nkappamanaa^eb^ti kaamasa"nkappaadivasena  duusitamanovitakkaa, etena manoduccaritamaaha. ^b^kaayena vaacaaya ca  sa.mkili.t.thaa^eb^ti paa.naatipaataadivasena kaayavaacaahi malinaa.  ^b^aasamaanaa^eb^ti aasiisamaanaa patthayamaanaa.
[03] eva.m petena sa"nkhepeneva kammaphalesu vibhajitvaa dassitesu ta.m  asaddahanto raajaa --
[21] ``ta.m kinti jaaneyyamaha.m avecca, kalyaa.napaapassa aya.m  vipaako.
[22] ki.m vaaha.m disvaa abhisaddaheyya.m, ko vaapi ma.m saddahaapeyya  eta''nti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^ta.m kinti jaaneyyamaha.m  aveccaa^eb^ti yoya.m tayaa ``ye du.t.thasa"nkappamanaa manussaa, kaayena vaacaaya  ca sa.mkili.t.thaa''tiaadinaa. ``apare pana sugatimaasamaanaa''tiaadinaa  ca kalyaa.nassa paapassa ca kammassa vipaako vibhajitvaa vutto, ta.m  kinti kena kaara.nena aha.m avecca ^a^M0.0211^ea^ ^a^V0.0197^ea^ aparapaccayabhaavena saddaheyya.m.  ^b^ki.m vaaha.m disvaa abhisaddaheyya^eb^nti kiidisa.m vaa panaaha.m  paccakkhabhuuta.m nidassana.m disvaa pa.tisaddaheyya.m. ^b^ko vaapi ma.m  saddahaapeyya eta^eb^nti ko vaa vi~n~nuu puriso pa.n.dito etamattha.m ma.m  saddahaapeyya, ta.m kathehiiti ^a^P0.0227^ea^ attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa peto kaara.nena tamattha.m tassa pakaasento --
[21] ``disvaa ca sutvaa abhisaddahassu, kalyaa.napaapassa aya.m  vipaako.
[22] kalyaa.napaape ubhaye asante, siyaa nu sattaa sugataa  duggataa vaa..
[21] ``no cettha kammaani kareyyu.m maccaa, kalyaa.napaapaani  manussaloke.
[22] naahesu.m sattaa sugataa duggataa vaa, hiinaa pa.niitaa ca  manussaloke..
[21] ``yasmaa ca kammaani karonti maccaa, kalyaa.napaapaani  manussaloke.
[22] tasmaa hi sattaa sugataa duggataa vaa, hiinaa pa.niitaa ca  manussaloke..
[21] ``dvayajja kammaana.m vipaakamaahu, sukhassa dukkhassa ca  vedaniiya.m.
[22] taa devataayo paricaarayanti, paccenti baalaa dvayata.m  apassino''ti.. --

[03] 542^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^disvaa caa^eb^ti paccakkhato disvaapi.  ^b^sutvaa^eb^ti dhamma.m sutvaa tadanusaarena naya.m nento anuminanto.  ^b^kalyaa.napaapassaa^eb^ti kusalassa akusalassa ca kammassa aya.m  sukho aya.m dukkho ca vipaakoti abhisaddahassu. ^b^ubhaye  asante^eb^ti kalyaa.ne paape caati duvidhe kamme avijjamaane.  ^b^siyaa nu sattaa sugataa duggataa vaa^eb^ti ``ime sattaa ^a^M0.0212^ea^ sugati.m gataa  duggati.m gataa vaa, sugatiya.m vaa a.d.dhaa duggatiya.m daliddaa vaa''ti  ayamattho ki.m nu siyaa katha.m sambhaveyyaati attho.

[03] 543-4^b^.^eb^ idaani yathaavuttamattha.m ^b^``no^eb^ ^a^P0.0228^ea^  ^b^cettha kammaanii''^eb^ti ca ^b^``yasmaa ca kammaanii''^eb^ti  ca gaathaadvayena byatirekato anvayato ca vibhaaveti. tattha ^b^hiinaa  pa.niitaa^eb^ti kularuupaarogyaparivaaraadiihi ^a^V0.0198^ea^ hiinaa u.laaraa ca.

[03] 545^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvayajja kammaana.m vipaakamaahuu^eb^ti dvaya.m duvidha.m  ajja idaani kammaana.m sucaritaduccaritaana.m vipaaka.m vadanti kathenti.  ki.m tanti aaha ^b^``sukhassa dukkhassa ca vedaniiya''^eb^nti, i.t.thassa  ca ani.t.thassa ca anubhavanayogga.m. ^b^taa devataayo paricaarayantii^eb^ti  ye ukka.msavasena sukhavedaniiya.m vipaaka.m pa.tilabhanti, te devaloke taa  devataa hutvaa dibbasukhasamappitaa indriyaani paricaarenti.  ^b^paccenti baalaa dvayata.m apassino^eb^ti ye baalaa kamma~nca  kammaphala~ncaati dvaya.m apassantaa asaddahantaa, te paapappasutaa  dukkhavedaniiya.m vipaaka.m anubhavantaa nirayaadiisu kammunaa paccenti dukkha.m  paapu.nanti.
[03] eva.m kammaphala.m saddahanto pana tva.m kasmaa evaruupa.m dukkha.m  paccanubhavasiiti anuyoga.m sandhaaya --
[21] ``na matthi kammaani saya.mkataani, datvaapi me natthi  yo aadiseyya.
[22] acchaadana.m sayanamathannapaana.m, tenamhi naggo kasiraa ca  vuttii''ti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^na matthi kammaani  saya.mkataanii^eb^ti yasmaa saya.m attanaa pubbe kataani pu~n~nakammaani mama  natthi na vijjanti, yehi idaani acchaadanaadiini labheyya.m.  ^b^datvaapi me natthi yo aadiseyyaa^eb^ti yo sama.nabraahma.naana.m daana.m  datvaa ``asukassa petassa hotuu''ti me aadiseyya uddiseyya, so  natthi. ^b^tenamhi naggo kasiraa ca vuttii^eb^ti tena duvidhenaapi  kaara.nena idaani naggo ^a^P0.0229^ea^ nicco.lo amhi, kasiraa  dukkhaa ca vutti jiivikaa hotiiti.
[03] ta.m ^a^M0.0213^ea^ sutvaa raajaa tassa acchaadanaadilaabha.m aaka"nkhanto --
[21] ``siyaa nu kho kaara.na.m ki~nci yakkha, acchaadana.m  yena tuva.m labhetha.
[22] aacikkha me tva.m yadatthi hetu, saddhaayika.m hetuvaco  su.nomaa''ti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^yenaa^eb^ti yena kaara.nena tva.m  ^b^acchaadana.m labhetha^eb^ labheyyaasi, ^b^ki~nci^eb^ ta.m ^b^kaara.na.m siyaa  nu kho^eb^ bhaveyya nu khoti attho. ^b^yadatthii^eb^ti yadi atthi.
[21] ``kappitako naama idhatthi bhikkhu, jhaayii susiilo  arahaa vimutto.
[21] ``sakhilo vada~n~nuu suvaco sumukho, svaagamo  suppa.timuttako ca.
[21] ``santo vidhuumo aniigho niraaso, mutto visallo  amamo ava"nko.
[22] niruupadhii sabbapapa~ncakhii.no, tisso vijjaa anuppatto  jutimaa..
[21] ``appa~n~naato disvaapi na ca sujaano, muniiti na.m  vajjisu voharanti.
[22] jaananti ta.m yakkhabhuutaa aneja.m, kalyaa.nadhamma.m vicaranta.m  loke..
[21] ``tassa ^a^M0.0214^ea^ ^a^P0.0230^ea^ tuva.m ekayuga.m duve vaa,  mamuddisitvaana sace dadetha.
[22] pa.tiggahiitaani ca taani assu, mama~nca passetha  sannaddhadussa''nti.. --

[03] 548^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^kappitato naamaa^eb^ti ja.tilasahassassa  abbhantare aayasmato upaalittherassa upajjhaaya.m sandhaaya vadati.  ^b^idhaa^eb^ti imissaa vesaaliyaa samiipe. ^b^jhaayii^eb^ti  aggaphalajhaanena jhaayii. ^b^siitibhuuto^eb^ti  sabbakilesadarathapari.laahavuupasamena siitibhaavappatto.  ^b^uttamadi.t.thipatto^eb^ti uttama.m aggaphala.m sammaadi.t.thi.m patto.

[03] 549^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakhilo^eb^ti mudu. ^b^suvaco^eb^ti  subbaco. ^b^svaagamo^eb^ti su.t.thu aagataagamo.  ^b^suppa.timuttako^eb^ti su.t.thu pa.timuttakavaaco, muttabhaa.niiti attho.  ^b^ara.navihaarii^eb^ti mettaavihaarii.

[03] 550^b^.^eb^ ^b^santo^eb^ti upasantakileso.  ^b^vidhuumo^eb^ti vigatamicchaavitakkadhuumo. ^b^aniigho^eb^ti niddukkho.  ^b^niraaso^eb^ti nitta.nho. ^b^mutto^eb^ti sabbabhavehi vimutto.  ^b^visallo^eb^ti viitaraagaadisallo. ^b^amamo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0200^ea^ mama.mkaaravirahito.  ^b^ava"nko^eb^ti kaayava"nkaadiva"nkavirahito. ^b^niruupadhii^eb^ti  kilesaabhisa"nkhaaraadiupadhippahaayii. ^b^sabbapapa~ncakhii.no^eb^ti  parikkhii.nata.nhaadipapa~nco. ^b^jutimaa^eb^ti anuttaraaya ~naa.najutiyaa  jutimaa. ^b^appa~n~naato^eb^ti paramappicchataaya pa.ticchannagu.nataaya ca  na paaka.to.

[03] 551^b^.^eb^ ^b^disvaapi na ca sujaano^eb^ti gambhiirabhaavena  disvaapi ``eva.msiilo, eva.mdhammo, eva.mpa~n~no''ti na suvi~n~neyyo.  ^b^jaananti ta.m yakkhabhuutaa aneja^eb^nti yakkhabhuutaa ca aneja.m nitta.nha.m  ``arahaa''ti ta.m jaananti. ^b^kalyaa.nadhamma^eb^nti  sundarasiilaadigu.na.m.

[03] 552^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassaa^eb^ti tassa kappitakamahaatherassa.  ^b^ekayuga^eb^nti eka.m vatthayuga.m. ^b^duve vaa^eb^ti dve vaa vatthayugaani.  ^b^mamuddisitvaanaa^eb^ti mama.m uddisitvaa. ^b^pa.tiggahiitaani^eb^  ^b^ca^eb^ ^a^P0.0231^ea^ ^b^taani assuu^eb^ti taani vatthayugaani tena  pa.tiggahitaani ca assu ^a^M0.0215^ea^ bhaveyyu.m. ^b^sannaddhadussa^eb^nti dussena  katasannaaha.m, laddhavattha.m nivatthapaarutadussanti attho.
[21] ``kasmi.m padese sama.na.m vasanta.m, gantvaana passemu maya.m  idaani.
[22] yo majja ka"nkha.m vicikicchita~nca, di.t.thiivisuukaani  vinodayeyyaa''ti.. --
[25] therassa vasana.t.thaana.m pucchi. tattha ^b^kasmi.m padese^eb^ti  katarasmi.m padese. ^b^yo majjaa^eb^ti yo ajja, ma-kaaro  padasandhikaro.
[22] dhammi.m katha.m bhaasati saccanaamo, sakasmimaacerake  appamatto''ti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^kapinaccanaaya^eb^nti kapiina.m  vaanaraana.m naccanena ``kapinaccanaa''ti laddhavohaare padese.  ^b^saccanaamo^eb^ti jhaayii susiilo arahaa vimuttotiaadiihi  gu.nanaamehi yaathaavanaamo avipariitanaamo ^a^V0.0201^ea^.
[03] eva.m petena vutte raajaa taavadeva therassa santika.m gantukaamo --
[21] ``tathaaha.m kassaami gantvaa idaani, acchaadayissa.m  sama.na.m yugena.
[22] pa.tiggahiitaani ca taani assu, tuva~nca passemu  sannaddhadussa''nti.. --
[03] atha peto ``devataana.m thero dhamma.m deseti, tasmaa naaya.m  upasa"nkamanakaalo''ti dassento --
[21] ``maa ^a^M0.0216^ea^ akkha.ne pabbajita.m upaagami, saadhu vo licchavi  nesa dhammo.
[22] tato ca kaale upasa"nkamitvaa, tattheva passaahi raho  nisinna''nti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^saadhuu^eb^ti aayaacane nipaato.  ^b^vo licchavi nesa dhammo^eb^ti, licchaviraaja, tumhaaka.m raajuuna.m esa  dhammo na hoti, ya.m akaale upasa"nkamana.m. ^b^tatthevaa^eb^ti tasmi.myeva  .thaane.

[01] eva.m petena vutte raajaa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa  attano nivesanameva gantvaa puna yuttapattakaale a.t.tha vatthuyugaani  gaahaapetvaa thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisinno pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa  ``imaani, bhante, a.t.tha vatthayugaani pa.tigga.nhaa''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa  thero kathaasamu.t.thaapanattha.m ``mahaaraaja, pubbe tva.m adaanasiilo  sama.nabraahma.naana.m vihe.thanajaatikova katha.m pa.niitaani vatthaani daatukaamo  jaato''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa raajaa tassa kaara.na.m aacikkhanto petena  samaagama.m, tena ca attanaa ca kathita.m sabba.m therassa aarocetvaa vatthaani  datvaa petassa uddisi. tena peto dibbavatthadharo ala"nkatapa.tiyatto  assaaru.lho therassa ca ra~n~no ca purato paatubhavi. ta.m disvaa raajaa  attamano pamudito piitisomanassajaato ``paccakkhato vata mayaa  kammaphala.m di.t.tha.m, na daanaaha.m paapa.m karissaami, pu~n~nameva karissaamii''ti  vatvaa tena petena sakkhi.m akaasi. so ca peto ``sace, tva.m  licchaviraaja, ito pa.t.thaaya adhamma.m pahaaya dhamma.m carasi, evaaha.m tava  sakkhi.m karissaami, santika~nca te aagamissaami, suulaavuta~nca purisa.m  siigha.m suulato mocehi, eva.m so jiivita.m labhitvaa dhamma.m caranto  dukkhato muccissati, thera~nca kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m  su.nanto ^a^V0.0202^ea^ pu~n~naani ^a^P0.0233^ea^ karohii''ti vatvaa gato.

[03] atha raajaa thera.m vanditvaa nagara.m pavisitvaa siigha.m siigha.m  licchaviparisa.m sannipaatetvaa te anujaanaapetvaa ta.m purisa.m suulato  mocetvaa ``ima.m aroga.m karothaa''ti tikicchake aa.naapesi. thera~nca  upasa"nkamitvaa pucchi -- ``siyaa nu kho, bhante, nirayagaamikamma.m  katvaa .thitassa nirayato muttii''ti. siyaa, mahaaraaja, sace u.laara.m  pu~n~na.m karoti, muccatiiti ^a^M0.0217^ea^ vatvaa thero raajaana.m sara.nesu ca siilesu ca  pati.t.thaapesi. so tattha pati.t.thito therassa ovaade .thatvaa sotaapanno  ahosi, suulaavuto pana puriso arogo hutvaa sa.mvegajaato bhikkhuusu  pabbajitvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tamattha.m dassentaa  sa"ngiitikaaraa --
[21] ``tathaati vatvaa agamaasi tattha, parivaarito  daasaga.nena licchavi.
[22] so ta.m nagara.m upasa"nkamitvaa, vaasuupagacchittha sake  nivesane..
[21] ``so ta.m padesa.m upasa"nkamitvaa, ta.m addasa sama.na.m  santacitta.m.
[22] pa.tikkanta.m gocarato nivatta.m, siitibhuuta.m rukkhamuule  nisinna.m..
[22] vesaaliya.m licchaviha.m bhadante, jaananti ma.m licchavi  ambasakkaro..
[21] ``imaani ^a^P0.0234^ea^ me a.t.tha yugaa subhaani,  pa.tigga.nha bhante padadaami tuyha.m.
[22] teneva atthena idhaagatosmi, yathaa aha.m attamano  bhaveyyanti..
[21] ``duuratova sama.naa braahma.naa ca, nivesana.m te  parivajjayanti.
[22] pattaani bhijjanti ca te nivesane, sa"nghaa.tiyo caapi  vidaalayanti..
[22] etaadisa.m pabbajitaa vihesa.m, tayaa kata.m sama.naa  paapu.nanti..
[21] ``ti.nena telampi na tva.m adaasi, muu.lhassa maggampi  na paavadaasi.
[27] andhassa da.n.da.m sayamaadiyaasi, etaadiso kadariyo  asa.mvuto tuva.m.
[22] atha tva.m kena va.n.nena kimeva disvaa, amhehi saha  sa.mvibhaaga.m karosiiti..
[21] ``paccemi bhante ya.m tva.m vadesi, vihesayi.m sama.ne  braahma.ne ca.
[22] khi.d.datthiko no ca padu.t.thacitto, etampi me dukka.tameva  bhante..
[21] khi.d.daaya yakkho pasavitvaa paapa.m, vedeti dukkha.m  asamattabhogii.
[22] daharo ^a^P0.0235^ea^ yuvaa nagganiyassa bhaagii, ki.m  su tato dukkhatarassa hoti..
[21] ``ta.m disvaa sa.mvegamalattha.m bhante, tappaccayaa vaapi  dadaami daana.m.
[22] pa.tigga.nha bhante vatthayugaani a.t.tha, yakkhassimaa gacchantu  dakkhi.naayoti..
[21] ``addhaa hi daana.m bahudhaa pasattha.m, dadato ca te  akkhayadhammamatthu.
[22] pa.tiga.nhaami te vatthayugaani a.t.tha, yakkhassimaa gacchantu  dakkhi.naayoti..
[21] ``tato ^a^M0.0219^ea^ hi so aacamayitvaa licchavi, therassa datvaana  yugaani a.t.tha.
[22] pa.tiggahiitaani ca taani assu, yakkha~nca passetha  sannaddhadussa.m..
[21] ``so ta.m disvaa attamano udaggo, paha.t.thacitto ca  subhaggaruupo.
[22] kamma~nca disvaana mahaavipaaka.m, sandi.t.thika.m cakkhunaa  sacchikatvaa..
[22] na caapi me ki~nci adeyyamatthi, tuva~nca me yakkha  bahuupakaaroti..
[21] ``tuva~nca me licchavi ekadesa.m, adaasi daanaani  amoghameta.m.
[22] svaaha.m ^a^P0.0236^ea^ karissaami tayaava sakkhi.m,  amaanuso maanusakena saddhinti..
[21] ``gatii ca bandhuu ca paraaya.na~nca, mitto mamaasi atha  devataa me.
[22] yaacaami ta.m pa~njaliko bhavitvaa, icchaami ta.m yakkha  punapi da.t.thunti..
[22] tva.m neva ma.m lacchasi dassanaaya, disvaa ca ta.m nopi ca  aalapissa.m..
[21] ``sace ^a^M0.0220^ea^ pana tva.m bhavissasi dhammagaaravo, daane rato  sa"ngahitattabhaavo.
[22] opaanabhuuto sama.nabraahma.naana.m, eva.m mama.m lacchasi  dassanaaya..
[21] ``disvaa ca ta.m aalapissa.m bhadante, ima~nca suulato  lahu.m pamu~nca.
[22] yatonidaana.m akarimha sakkhi.m, ma~n~naami suulaavutakassa  kaara.naa..
[21] ``te a~n~nama~n~na.m akarimha sakkhi.m, aya~nca suulato lahu.m  pamutto.
[27] sakkacca dhammaani samaacaranto, mucceyya so nirayaa ca  tamhaa.
[22] saya.m mukhenuupanisajja puccha, so te akkhissati  etamattha.m..
[21] ``tameva bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa, pucchassu a~n~natthiko  no ca padu.t.thacitto.
[22] so te suta.m asuta~ncaapi dhamma.m, sabbampi akkhissati  yathaa pajaananti..
[21] ``so ^a^V0.0205^ea^ tattha rahassa.m samullapitvaa, sakkhi.m karitvaana  amaanusena.
[22] pakkaami so licchavina.m sakaasa.m, atha bravi parisa.m  sannisinna.m..
[21] ```su.nantu ^a^M0.0221^ea^ bhonto mama ekavaakya.m, vara.m varissa.m  labhissaami attha.m.
[21] ```ettaavataa viisatirattimattaa, yato aavuto neva  jiivati na mato.
[22] taaha.m mocayissaami daani, yathaamati.m anujaanaatu  sa"ngho'ti..
[21] ```eta~nca a~n~na~nca lahu.m pamu~nca, ko ta.m vadetha tathaa  karonta.m.
[22] yathaa pajaanaasi tathaa karohi, yathaamati.m anujaanaati  sa"ngho'ti..
[21] ``so ^a^P0.0238^ea^ ta.m padesa.m upasa"nkamitvaa,  suulaavuta.m mocayi khippameva.
[22] maa bhaayi sammaati ca ta.m avoca, tikicchakaana~nca  upa.t.thapesi..
[22] saya.m mukhenuupanisajja licchavi, tatheva pucchittha na.m  kaara.natthiko..
[22] ettaavataa viisatirattimattaa, yato aavuto neva jiivati  na mato..
[21] ``so mocito gantvaa mayaa idaani, etassa yakkhassa  vaco hi bhante.
[22] siyaa nu kho kaara.na.m ki~ncideva, yena so niraya.m no  vajeyya..
[21] ``aacikkha ^a^M0.0222^ea^ bhante yadi atthi hetu, saddhaayika.m hetuvaco  su.noma.
[22] na tesa.m kammaana.m vinaasamatthi, avedayitvaa idha  byantibhaavoti..
[22] mucceyya so nirayaa ca tamhaa, kamma.m siyaa a~n~natra  vedaniiyanti..
[21] ``a~n~naato ^a^V0.0206^ea^ eso purisassa attho, mamampi daani  anukampa bhante.
[22] anusaasa ma.m ovada bhuuripa~n~na, yathaa aha.m no niraya.m  vajeyyanti..
[21] ``ajjeva buddha.m sara.na.m upehi, dhamma~nca ^a^P0.0239^ea^  sa"ngha~nca pasannacitto.
[22] tatheva sikkhaaya padaani pa~nca, akha.n.daphullaani  samaadiyassu..
[27] amajjapo maa ca musaa abhaa.nii, sakena daarena ca hoti  tu.t.tho.
[22] ima~nca ariya.m a.t.tha"ngavarenupeta.m, samaadiyaahi kusala.m  sukhudraya.m..
[22] mu~nca tuva.m nirayaa ca tamhaa, kamma.m siyaa a~n~natra  vedaniiyanti..
[21] ``ajjeva buddha.m sara.na.m upemi, dhamma~nca sa"ngha~nca  pasannacitto.
[22] tatheva sikkhaaya padaani pa~nca, akha.n.daphullaani  samaadiyaami..
[27] amajjapo no ca musaa bha.naami, sakena daarena ca  homi tu.t.tho.
[22] ima~nca ariya.m a.t.tha"ngavarenupeta.m, samaadiyaami kusala.m  sukhudraya.m..
[22] dadaami na vikampaami, buddhaana.m saasane ratoti..
[22] saddho muduu kaarakaro ca bhikkhu, sa"ngha~nca sakkacca tadaa  upa.t.thahi..
[21] ``suulaavuto ca arogo hutvaa, serii sukhii pabbajja.m  upaagami.
[22] bhikkhu~nca aagamma kappitakuttama.m, ubhopi  saama~n~naphalaani ajjhagu.m..
[21] ``etaadisaa ^a^M0.0224^ea^ sappurisaana sevanaa, mahapphalaa hoti sata.m  vijaanata.m.
[22] suulaavuto aggaphala.m aphassayi, phala.m kani.t.tha.m pana  ambasakkaro''ti.. --
